extension.category: Checks integrity of the JORAM diagram.

constraints.constraint: ScalAgentServer.allInstances()->one(j | j.sid = self.sid) Unicity of server id check. Server Id (sid) must be unique.
NetworkDomain.allInstances()->one(n | n.name = self.name) Unicity of domain name check. Domain name must be unique.

self.oclAsType(ecore::EObject).eContainer().oclAsType(ScalAgentServer).services->select(f | f.oclIsKindOf(ConnectionManager))->notEmpty() TCPProxyService with ConnectionManager check. TCPProxyService can't work without a ConnectionManager service.

constraint.name: Topic class availability.
constraint.message: Unknown topic class: {0}. Check Joram extension file for known extensions.

constraint.name: Queue class availability.
constraint.message: Unknown queue class: {0}. Check Joram extension file for known extensions.

constraint.name: Service class availability
constraint.message: Unknown service class: {0}. Check Joram extension file for known extensions.

constraint.name: Joram extension file definition.
constraint.description: Check if Joram extension file has been defined.
constraint.message: Joram extension file has not been defined under Window > Preferences > Joram Diagram. Queue, topic, and custom service class names will not be checked.
